name: What is Nezuko up to?
description:
Inside Tanjiro's box, what does Nezuko do? Dash around as Nezuko as she waits for the next demon slaying battle!

Quick Prototype made in Godot, Python.

Credits:

Nezuko Art made by そふら ( Sofura )  from pixiv

https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/4169306

Music: Hand Trolley by Kevin Macleod

http://incompetech.com/music

Font: Cream by Shaped Fonts

https://www.dafont.com/cream-2.font
